data.note: 2026-01-16 22:22 - Completed [rgd]: Added mobile touch interactions. Key implementation details: (1) Touch targets use @media (pointer: coarse) to apply 44px minimum sizing only on touch devices - keeps desktop UI unchanged. (2) Drag-and-drop uses long-press (300ms) to differentiate from scroll gestures - the startTouchDrag function creates a ghost element and placeholder. data.note: 2026-01-16 22:36 - Completed [vxc]: Added service worker for PWA offline support. Key implementation: (1) sw.js uses cache-first strategy for static assets (/static/*) with stale-while-revalidate pattern - returns cached response immediately but fetches update in background. (4) Fixed manifest.json icon paths to use absolute URLs (/static/...) for proper resolution. (5) Service worker registration in index.html happens on 'load' event. Cache version is 'tickboard-v1' - increment when deploying breaking changes.
